import { LCDClient, MnemonicKey } from '@terra-money/terra.js'; import { Card, Row, Col, CardTitle, CardBody, Button, Container } from "reactstrap"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const Forms = () => { // 니모닉 키 만들기 const MNE_KEY_RANDOM = new MnemonicKey(); const MNE_KEY_ARR = MNE_KEY_RANDOM.mnemonic.split(' ') return ( Wallet Create 개발중
{MNE_KEY_ARR[0]}
mnemonic 2
mnemonic 3
mnemonic 4
mnemonic 5
mnemonic 6
mnemonic 7
mnemonic 8
mnemonic 9
mnemonic 10
mnemonic 11
mnemonic 12
); }; export default Forms;
